articles.author: Sarah Little
articles.title: Zack Snyder's New Movie Universe Begins The Exact Same Day His Old One Dies - Screen Rant
articles.description: Zack Snyder’s highly anticipated movie franchise debuts in December 2023 on the same day that his previously worked on film universe ends.
articles.content:
